Title: Kindling the Fire
Description:
Now that that's done with, let's get to it then!

Huo, the spirit of fire, hungers for dry dogwood root kindling. It grows among the trees south of the village. It should be easy enough for you to gather some.
CompletionText: I hope you're not shy about getting your hands dirty.
RewardText: $n! You've returned, roots in hand! You're a down-to-business kind of $G guy:gal;, aren't you? I like that!
